Test.Name: Correct response
Test.Description: Check NVT PTZ SET CONFIGURTATION test when DUT return correct response.

ExpectedResult.TestSummary:
PTZ-2-1-4 PTZ SET CONFIGURATION
STEP 1 - Getting PTZ service address Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 2 - Connect to PTZ service PTZ service address: http://localhost:3246/onvif/ServicePTZ20/PtzService.asmx STEP PASSED
STEP 3 - Get PTZ configurations Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 4 - Validating GetConfigurations response STEP PASSED
STEP 5 - Validating PTZ configuration STEP PASSED
STEP 6 - Getting PTZ configuration options Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 7 - Validating PTZ configuration options STEP PASSED
STEP 8 - Setting PTZ configuration [token = PTZ-Token1]. Default timeout = PT0.05S Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 9 - Get PTZ configuration Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 10 - Validating new PTZ configuration STEP PASSED
TEST PASSED
